description:
Enables the Google Compute Engine
[Shared VPC](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/shared-vpc)
feature for a project, assigning it as a Shared VPC service project associated
with a given host project.

For more information, see,
[the Project API documentation](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/reference/latest/projects),
where the Shared VPC feature is referred to by its former name "XPN".

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

HostProject.description: The ID of a host project to associate.

ServiceProject.description: The ID of the project that will serve as a Shared VPC service project.
